title: Earendil
data:
[![Wikipedia](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "Wikipedia")

[Wikipedia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page "wikipedia:Main Page") has an article about:

***[Eärendil](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E%C3%A4rendil "wikipedia:Eärendil")***

| @ Earendil [![Earendil.png](/images/4/4e/Earendil.png)](/wiki/File:Earendil.png) |            |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                  | 20         |
| **Attacks**                                                                      | Weapon 1d8 |
|                                                                                  |            |

| @ Earendil [![Earendil.png](/images/4/4e/Earendil.png)](/wiki/File:Earendil.png)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 20            |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | Weapon 1d8    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |               |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 20            |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | 12            |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 0             |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 30            |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | -20 (chaotic) |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |               |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | Unique        |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | No            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |               |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 800           |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | 350           |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Medium        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |               |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | Sleep         |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Sleep         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |               |
| Earendil:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* can [see invisible creatures](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is an [elf](/wiki/Elf_\(monster_attribute\) "Elf (monster attribute)").
* is male.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* lets you close unless attacked.
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |               |

Earendil was the [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader") for male [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(role\) "Elf (role)") prior to 3.3.0, and the [Drow](/wiki/Drow "Drow") [quest nemesis](/wiki/Quest_nemesis "Quest nemesis") in versions of [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") before race and role were separated. It should be noted that in SLASH'EM, his MR is changed to 50, and his alignment is changed to 20. The reason for the alignment change is likely because in SLASH'EM, Elves are [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful") by default.

## Elwing

| Elwing:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* can [see invisible creatures](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.

* is female.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* lets you close unless attacked.
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |               |

Elwing was the [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader") for female [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(role\) "Elf (role)") prior to 3.3.0. Other than her name and gender, she has the same stats as Earendil.

## Encyclopedia entry (SLASH'EM)

In after days, when because of the triumph of Morgoth Elves and  
Men became estranged, as he most wished, those of the Elven-race  
that lived still in Middle-earth waned and faded, and Men usurped  
the sunlight. Then the Quendi wandered in the lonely places of the  
great lands and the isles, and took to the moonlight and the  
starlight, and to the woods and the caves, becoming as shadows  
and memories, save those who ever and anon set sail into the West  
and vanished from Middle-earth. But in the dawn of years Elves  
and Men were allies and held themselves akin, and there were some  
among Men that learned the wisdom of the Eldar, and became great  
and valiant among the captains of the Noldor. And in the glory  
and beauty of the Elves, and in their fate, full share had the  
offspring of elf and mortal, Earendil, and Elwing, and Elrond  
their child.

\[ The Silmarillion, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Earendil\&action=edit)*
html:
Earendil

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Wikipedia has an article about:
Eärendil


@ Earendil
Difficulty 20
Attacks Weapon 1d8
@ Earendil
Difficulty 20
Attacks

Weapon 1d8

Base level 20

Speed 12
Base AC 0
Base MR 30
Alignment -20 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 800
Nutritional value 350
Size Medium
Resistances Sleep
Resistances conveyed Sleep

Earendil:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is an elf.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • lets you close unless attacked.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.

Earendil was the quest leader for male elves prior to 3.3.0, and the Drow quest nemesis in versions of SLASH'EM before race and role were separated. It should be noted that in SLASH'EM, his MR is changed to 50, and his alignment is changed to 20. The reason for the alignment change is likely because in SLASH'EM, Elves are lawful by default.

Elwing

Elwing was the quest leader for female elves prior to 3.3.0. Other than her name and gender, she has the same stats as Earendil.

Encyclopedia entry (SLASH'EM)

In after days, when because of the triumph of Morgoth Elves and
Men became estranged, as he most wished, those of the Elven-race
that lived still in Middle-earth waned and faded, and Men usurped
the sunlight. Then the Quendi wandered in the lonely places of the
great lands and the isles, and took to the moonlight and the
starlight, and to the woods and the caves, becoming as shadows
and memories, save those who ever and anon set sail into the West
and vanished from Middle-earth. But in the dawn of years Elves
and Men were allies and held themselves akin, and there were some
among Men that learned the wisdom of the Eldar, and became great
and valiant among the captains of the Noldor. And in the glory
and beauty of the Elves, and in their fate, full share had the
offspring of elf and mortal, Earendil, and Elwing, and Elrond
their child.

[ The Silmarillion, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]
